name: Aurecology
description:
Aurecology is a 2D Puzzle turn-based Game where we try to balance money, environmental health, and the land and the land change based on player choice.

Part of #regenerategamejam 2022, team is as follows:

  • William - Audio/Music (williamphilipson.com)
  • Alejandro - Writer 
  • Tate (punctualpangolin.itch.io)  - Programmer  (tatekennington.com)
  • Josh (joshij10.itch.io) - Mentor/Project Lead (@JoshiJ10X)
  • Francis - Artist

Special thanks:

  • Niva Kay (nivja.itch.io), Kerry Top, and the team at Pakaraka Permaculture for making this jam a reality (itch.io/profile/pakaraka-permaculture)
  • Cupnoobles (cupnooble.itch.io) for letting us use their asset pack to test out the mechanics of our game: cupnooble.itch.io/sprout-lands-asset-pack
  • Dafont for letting us use their font family Big Heroes: dafont.com/big-heroes.font
